title.narrative: POLICY AND INFORMATION SYSTEM

description.narrative: 2.1.1 By 2017, the Children and Adolescents' Information System (SINA) generates information that informs policy makers for the formulation and revisions of legislations, public policies and programs targeted at reducing inequities ., which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2.1 By 2017, increased national and local capacities to systematically monitor and generate quality information, ensure that disadvantaged children and adolescents are prioritized by social policies and programs.

participating-org.narrative: ASOCIACION SERVICIO JESUITA PARA MIGRANTES COSTA RICA
FUNDACION DE UNIVERSIDAD COSTA RICA PARA LA INVESTIGACION

sector.narrative: Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
National social protection strategies: Policies, strategies, legislation and coordination (inter-ministerial, donor)
PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 2.1.1 By 2017, the Children and Adolescents? Information System (SINA) generates information that informs policy makers for theformulation and revisions of legislations, public policies and programs targeted at reducing inequities .

description.narrative: Creating new and strengthening existing information to improve decisions in institutions. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2018

title.narrative: Indicator 2.1.1.1: Strengthened Information System on Children and Adolescents (SINA) through the implementation of a strategy.

baseline.value: Currently no strategy to produce, analyze and disseminate disaggregated statistical data. At present available information is collected by the National Statistics Institute (INEC), MICS 2011 and other

target.value: 2014:By 2014, develop and implement a strategy and produce regular updates of children and adolescent focused statistics. BY 2017, evaluate implementation of strategy.

actual.value: 2017:En 2017, UNICEF e INEC desarrollaron y dise?aron el Sistema de Mapas Sociales en Ni?os y Adolescentes, este sistema fue parte del Sistema de Ni?os y Adolescentes (SINA). Las fuentes de la informacion en el sistema son el registro administrativo. Se avanzo en la revision de los indicadores demografic

title.narrative: Indicator 2.1.1.2: Rights monitoring institutions using the SINA information platform.

target.value: 2015:By 2015, Children Rights monitoring institutions using SINA information platform to track compliance with MDGs/Promise Renewed, CRC recommendations, CEDAW and international targets for water and sanit

actual.value: 2017:System of Social Maps in Children and Adolescents was presented and used by the institutions that conform the SEN (National Statistic System). 28 institutions were trained in the use of the platform.

title.narrative: Indicator 2.1.1.3: System of indicators on violence against children and women implemented and data is being used by institutions.

baseline.value: No existing system of indicators on violence against children and women.

target.value: 2014:By 2014, there will be a system of indicators on violence running and used as a decision-making tool.

actual.value: 2017:In 2017 the Office continued to support the improvement of statistics PANI, Ministry of Health and other institutions.We support the INEC in the implmentation of the System of Social Maps in Children and Adolescents, in this system in 2018, we are going to create a module in violence.
